metadata.name: Four-Dimensional Pocket/四次元口袋
metadata.description:
Have you visited the entire map for a long time to find and transfer pickups because of playing d20 or Insufficient blood for sacrifice?
Do you find it troublesome to pick up great amount of drops ?
Try this "Four-Dimensional Pocket" MOD!
Press the I key to catch pickups all in the room !
Press the O key to pour them out of the pocket!
CAUTIONS:
Due to balance considerations, 4d pockets currently only support used in
DEFAUL ROOM SUPERSECRET_ROOM SECRET_ROOM SACRIFICE_ROOM
this mod only has been tested on rep
According to your feedback, there may be further updates
============================================== 你有因为玩d20或者因为缺血献祭而绕遍整个地图吗
你觉得捡很多掉落物时麻烦吗
试试这个四次元口袋!
按下I键捡起房间里的所有掉落!
按下O键倒出口袋里的所有东西!
请注意:
由于平衡性的考虑,目前只支持在
普通房
隐藏房
超级隐藏房
献祭房 使用四维口袋
这个mod只在忏悔上测试过
以后可能会根据阁下们的反馈进行后续的更新 ======
